Nasal endoscopy.context: Operations Performed: 1. Nasal endoscopy. 2. Partial rhinectomy.

partial rhinectomy.context: Nasal endoscopy and partial rhinectomy due to squamous cell carcinoma, left nasal cavity.

squamous cell carcinoma.context: Nasal endoscopy and partial rhinectomy due to squamous cell carcinoma, left nasal cavity.

Squamous cell carcinoma.context: Postoperative Diagnosis: Squamous cell carcinoma, left nasal cavity.

Partial rhinectomy.context: Operations Performed: 1. Nasal endoscopy. 2. Partial rhinectomy.

81-year-old.context: This is an 81-year-old gentleman who underwent septorhinoplasty many years ago.

septorhinoplasty.context: This is an 81-year-old gentleman who underwent septorhinoplasty many years ago.

skin lesion.context: He also has a history of a skin lesion, which was removed from the nasal ala many years ago, the details of which he does not recall.

tenderness.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

induration.context: The preoperative examination shows induration of the nasal tip without significant erythema.

folliculitis.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

cellulitis.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

invasive squamous cell carcinoma.context: He was evaluated by Dr. A, who performed the septorhinoplasty, and underwent an intranasal biopsy, which showed histologic evidence of invasive squamous cell carcinoma.

erythema.context: The preoperative examination shows induration of the nasal tip without significant erythema.

focal tenderness.context: There is focal tenderness just cephalad to the alar crease.

lesion.context: There is no lesion either externally or intranasally.

Afrin.context: Following induction of adequate general endotracheal anesthesia, the left nose was decongested with Afrin.

diffuse invasive squamous cell carcinoma.context: A diagnosis of diffuse invasive squamous cell carcinoma was rendered.

diffuse squamous cell carcinoma.context: Frozen section examination again revealed diffuse squamous cell carcinoma throughout the soft tissues involving all margins.
